record.title: EXPRESSING CONDOLENCES TO GREENSBURG, KS

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 190 which was submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
